meanings.definition: The act of communicating by speaking.
meanings.sent1: Her talking was so loud that everyone could hear her.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to the talking of my friends during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The talking of the birds outside my window woke me up early.
meanings.sent4: The constant talking of the stream soothed my mind.
meanings.sent5: The talking of the radio host was clear and easy to understand.

meanings.sent1: She enjoys talking with her best friend about their day.
meanings.sent2: We were talking about our favorite movies last night.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog seemed to be talking to each other in their own way.
meanings.sent4: The trees were talking to the wind as their leaves rustled.
meanings.sent5: The students were talking excitedly about the upcoming school trip.

meanings.definition: Expressing thoughts or ideas through speech.
meanings.sent1: He was talking passionately about his new project at work.
meanings.sent2: She was talking to the audience about the importance of recycling.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the garden were talking to each other about the weather.
meanings.sent4: The old book seemed to be talking to me, sharing its stories.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was talking clearly, making the lesson easy to understand.
